text: 3. A particle of mass m=2 is acted on by a force F = (4, 61>, —4t) At t = 0, the particle has velocity zero and is located at the point (1,2,3). (a) Find the velocity vector v(t) for ¢ > 0. (b) Find the position vector r(t) for ¢ > 0. (c) Find () the curvature of the path traversed by the particle for ¢ > 0. (d) Find the work done by the force on the particle from t =0 to t = T.
